= CLI =

`find oem-starter-kit/packages -name *.js ! -path "*/node_modules/*" ! -path "*/build/*" ! -path "*/*.pcss.js" ! -path "*/*.pcssm.js" -exec grep -rn 'enableSplunkBar' {} 2>/dev/null \;`

find every .js file which contains 'enableSplunkBar' from oem-starter-kit/packages directory except the files which filename contains build pcss.js or pcssm.js.

= Crontab =

1. every N minites
